Question
========
Which unit is used to measure frequency?


Answerlist
----------
* hertz (Hz)
* second (s)
* metres per second (m/s)
* metre (m)
* seconds per metre (s/m)


Solution
========
Frequency can be measured in units of hertz (Hz)
